name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Dedicated Senior Web Engineer with over 10 years of robust experience in full stack development, specializing in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, and **RxJS** for crafting high-performance web applications. Proficient in **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **SCSS**, combined with advanced skills in **REST API** development, ensuring seamless integrations and data handling.

Experienced in Agile methodologies, particularly **Scrum**, enabling efficient project management and collaboration within cross-functional teams. Demonstrated expertise in **Unit Testing**, **Integration Testing**, and **Code Review** enhances code quality and fosters a culture of continuous improvement. Strong communication skills and a commitment to producing thorough **Technical Documentation** support team success and client satisfaction.

Additionally, I possess a solid foundation in DevOps practices, having deployed and managed cloud-native solutions on platforms like Azure and AWS. My background in MLOps with tools like MLflow furthers my capacity to implement intelligent solutions that drive impacts in real-world applications. I am passionate about blending technical excellence with innovative design for sustainable, compliant software solutions.
